context:
Test awakens in a dark forest. A mysterious figure approaches.

The figure, cloaked and hooded, doesn't flinch as you unleash a meager Firebolt. It sputters harmlessly against their raised hand. The figure chuckles, a chilling sound. "Such petty magic will not avail you here." Before you can react, the figure casts a spell of their own, and dark tendrils lash out! Do you attempt to dodge or defend?
